TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 172
TEI.2.document_title: Jose Antonio Navarro to Stephen F Austin, 02-18-1829

barker_notes.barker_summary: José Antonio Navarro to Austin, Bexar, February 18, 1829. Sending Austin $120 with which to buy goods for him either in New Orleans or in the colony. (Omitted.)
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 172

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*José Antonio Navarro to Austin, Bexar, February 18, 1829. Sending Austin $120 with which to buy goods for him either in New Orleans or in the colony. (Omitted.)*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Bexar*/location_mentioned*, *date_mentioned n="02-18-1829">February 18, 1829.*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*See Calendar.*/p*
